name: The Village Of Leprechauns
description:
GOAL OF THE GAME:

the goal of the game is simple, you have to collect 25K of money, then you have to buy rainbows by pressed that pot at the bottom of the screen

P next to subtitles means PEOPLE

W next to subtitles means WORKING PEOPLE

c next to subtitles means MONEY

All sounds come from website https://freesound.org/
Font: Press Start 2P
